languages.text: {n}Обожженные губы кривятся в горькой усмешке.{/n} "Как ни странно... да, Ваша Светлость. Друкари не подозревали, что обычный секретарь Адептус Администратум понимает их чужеродную речь. Пока ксеносы решали, как именно будут меня убивать, они что-то говорили о том, что им все это время помогали другие "мон-каи". Ренегаты, или пираты, или... кто-то вроде. Понадобится время, чтобы вычислить этих предателей Человечества, но, даю слово, они поплатятся за то, что произошло на Даргонусе!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Обожженные губы кривятся в горькой усмешке.{/n} "Как ни странно... да, Ваша Светлость. Друкари не подозревали, что обычный секретарь Адептус Администратум понимает их чужеродную речь. Пока ксеносы решали, как именно будут меня убивать, они что-то говорили о том, что им все это время помогали другие "мон-каи". Ренегаты, или пираты, или... кто-то вроде. Понадобится время, чтобы вычислить этих предателей Человечества, но, даю слово, они поплатятся за то, что произошло на Даргонусе!"

languages.text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Oddly enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. While they were deliberating over how they were going to kill me, they mentioned that other 'mon-keigh' had been helping them all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

languages.text: {n}彼は焼けた唇でわずかに苦笑した。{/n}「不思議なことに…色々理解しました、陛下。デュカーリは帝国行政局の長官風情が異種族の言葉を理解できるとは夢にも思わなかったのでしょう。私をどのようにして殺すかを奴らが話し合っている間に、別の『モン＝ケイ』が奴らにずっと手を貸していたのだと漏らしました。背教者か、海賊か…そういった類の者だと思います。人類の裏切り者を特定するまで時間を要しますが、必ずやダルゴナスでしでかした罪の代償を払わせると誓います！」
languages.original_text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Oddly enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. While they were deliberating over how they were going to kill me, they mentioned that other 'mon-keigh' had been helping them all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は焼けた唇でわずかに苦笑した。{/n}「不思議なことに…色々理解しました、陛下。デュカーリは帝国行政局の長官風情が異種族の言葉を理解できるとは夢にも思わなかったのでしょう。私をどのようにして殺すかを奴らが話し合っている間に、別の『モン＝ケイ』が奴らにずっと手を貸していたのだと漏らしました。背教者か、海賊か…そういった類の者だと思います。人類の裏切り者を特定するまで時間を要しますが、必ずやダルゴナスでしでかした罪の代償を払わせると誓います！」

languages.text: {n}他灼伤的嘴唇露出一丝苦笑。{/n}“老实说……我确实了解到了一些很古怪的情况，大人。那些黑暗灵族或许没有想到，区区一介帝国内政部秘书，竟然能听懂异形的语言。在他们商量着要怎么杀掉我的时候，他们提到了某些‘猴子’一直都在为他们提供协助。叛乱分子、海盗……诸如此类的人。想揪出人类的叛徒或许要花上些时间，但我向您保证，他们一定会为达戈努斯发生的一切付出代价。”
languages.original_text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Oddly enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. While they were deliberating over how they were going to kill me, they mentioned that other 'mon-keigh' had been helping them all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他灼伤的嘴唇露出一丝苦笑。{/n}“老实说……我确实了解到了一些很古怪的情况，大人。那些黑暗灵族或许没有想到，区区一介帝国内政部秘书，竟然能听懂异形的语言。在他们商量着要怎么杀掉我的时候，他们提到了某些‘猴子’一直都在为他们提供协助。叛乱分子、海盗……诸如此类的人。想揪出人类的叛徒或许要花上些时间，但我向您保证，他们一定会为达戈努斯发生的一切付出代价。”

languages.text: {n}Sus labios quemados esbozan una amarga sonrisa.{/n} «Es curioso... pero sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Los Drukhari no tenían ni idea de que un simple secretario del Adeptus Administratum podría entender su lengua alienígena. Mientras debatían sobre cómo matarme, mencionaron que otros "mon-keigh" les habían ayudado todo este tiempo. Serían renegados, piratas... o algo parecido. Tardaré en identificar a estos traidores a la Humanidad, ¡pero le doy mi palabra de que pagarán por lo sucedido en Dargonus!».
languages.original_text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Oddly enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. While they were deliberating over how they were going to kill me, they mentioned that other 'mon-keigh' had been helping them all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus labios quemados esbozan una amarga sonrisa.{/n} «Es curioso... pero sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Los Drukhari no tenían ni idea de que un simple secretario del Adeptus Administratum podría entender su lengua alienígena. Mientras debatían sobre cómo matarme, mencionaron que otros "mon-keigh" les habían ayudado todo este tiempo. Serían renegados, piratas... o algo parecido. Tardaré en identificar a estos traidores a la Humanidad, ¡pero le doy mi palabra de que pagarán por lo sucedido en Dargonus!».

languages.text: {n}Ses lèvres brûlées se tordent en un sourire amer.{/n} « Étonnamment... oui, Votre Seigneurie. Les Drukharis n'ont pas imaginé une seule seconde qu'un vulgaire secrétaire de l'Adeptus Administratum pouvait comprendre leur langue. Pendant qu'ils débattaient sur la meilleure manière de me tuer, ils ont mentionné que d'autres "mon-keigh" les soutenaient depuis le début. Des renégats, des pirates, ou... quelque chose d'approchant. Il nous faudra du temps pour identifier ces traîtres à l'humanité, mais je vous promets qu'ils paieront pour ce qu'ils ont fait à Dargonus ! »
languages.original_text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Oddly enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. While they were deliberating over how they were going to kill me, they mentioned that other 'mon-keigh' had been helping them all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses lèvres brûlées se tordent en un sourire amer.{/n} « Étonnamment... oui, Votre Seigneurie. Les Drukharis n'ont pas imaginé une seule seconde qu'un vulgaire secrétaire de l'Adeptus Administratum pouvait comprendre leur langue. Pendant qu'ils débattaient sur la meilleure manière de me tuer, ils ont mentionné que d'autres "mon-keigh" les soutenaient depuis le début. Des renégats, des pirates, ou... quelque chose d'approchant. Il nous faudra du temps pour identifier ces traîtres à l'humanité, mais je vous promets qu'ils paieront pour ce qu'ils ont fait à Dargonus ! »

languages.text: {n}Seine verbrannten Lippen verziehen sich zu einem verbitterten Lächeln.{/n} "Seltsamerweise ... konnte ich das tatsächlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Drukhari ahnten nicht, dass ein einfacher Sekretär des Adeptus Administratum ihre fremdartige Sprache verstehen könnte. Während sie darüber berieten, wie sie mich töten würden, erwähnten sie, dass andere 'Chem-Pan-Sey' ihnen die ganze Zeit geholfen hatten. Abtrünnige, Piraten oder dergleichen. Es wird dauern, diese Verräter an der Menschheit ausfindig zu machen, aber ich gebe Euch mein Wort, dass sie für die Ereignisse auf Dargonus bezahlen werden!"
languages.original_text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Oddly enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. While they were deliberating over how they were going to kill me, they mentioned that other 'mon-keigh' had been helping them all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Seine verbrannten Lippen verziehen sich zu einem verbitterten Lächeln.{/n} "Seltsamerweise ... konnte ich das tatsächlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Drukhari ahnten nicht, dass ein einfacher Sekretär des Adeptus Administratum ihre fremdartige Sprache verstehen könnte. Während sie darüber berieten, wie sie mich töten würden, erwähnten sie, dass andere 'Chem-Pan-Sey' ihnen die ganze Zeit geholfen hatten. Abtrünnige, Piraten oder dergleichen. Es wird dauern, diese Verräter an der Menschheit ausfindig zu machen, aber ich gebe Euch mein Wort, dass sie für die Ereignisse auf Dargonus bezahlen werden!"

languages.text: {n}Yanık dudaklarında acı bir tebessüm beliriyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... İlginçtir ki edindim. Drukhariler, benim gibi zavallı bir Adeptus Administratum yazmanının yabancı dillerini anlayabileceğini düşünmemiş olsa gerek. Beni nasıl öldüreceklerini tartıştıkları sırada başından beri mon-keighlerden yardım aldıklarını öğrendim. İsyancı mı demişlerdi, korsan mı... İnsanlığa ihanet eden bu alçakları bulmak zaman alacaktır fakat yemin olsun, Dargonus'ta olan bitenin bedelini ödeyecekler!"
languages.original_text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Oddly enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. While they were deliberating over how they were going to kill me, they mentioned that other 'mon-keigh' had been helping them all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

İnsanlığa ihanet eden bu alçakları bulmak zaman alacaktır fakat yemin olsun, Dargonus'ta olan bitenin bedelini ödeyecekler!"
